tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We recently located here from Mumbai and when asked in our society who is the best Child specialist in this area there were over 20 recommendation all were of Dr. Suruchi. Our son has wheezing problem which got increased after relocation to bangalore. We met Dr. Suruchi and we were very happy with her consultation. She was very nice and took a detailed history and went through the whole file of our sons previous treatment. She made simple recommendations and even reduced the number of medications our son was taking. He is now much better and we are very grateful to have met such an amazing doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
I was referred to Dr. Suruchi by few friends who were very happy with her consultation. I am very happy that I met her as my daughter had irregular periods and was diagnosed with PCOS.. This really scared me but Dr. Suruchi explained with such calmness about  the condition and how to deal with it and that communication made me feel at ease .

I can’t thank her enough for not just treating my daughter for PCOS but for being available to answer any concerns anytime.
I would highly recommend her as she is very genuine and doesn’t prescribe tests or medication unnecessarily.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review: Had a very unpleasant experience, traveled from quit a distance to show my son who needed medical attention and by the time we reached they casually said the doctor left and you can visit her tomorrow , ( like I came here for Parlor service ) it was not just us there were many patients waiting for her and they were not even notified about the doctors absence  .  The bad part is the doctor ( Suruchi Agarwal ) didn’t even seem to care to come back , like her patience lives doesn’t matter to her , **** *** ***** *** ***** ** *** *** ** *** *** * ********** ******

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctors are the second name of god and she is. During covid time she took utmost care of my kids by regular following up. She was answering all the queries at any time of the day. We were really worried but she gave the confidence and with her regular follow up, we could able to come out from that trauma. I will highly recommend Dr. Suruchi for your kids

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Visited Dr Suruchi on 14th March 2022. This was regarding my 4 yr old daughter who had unsettling fever for a week. 
The doctor was very patient to listen to us. She was very comforting. After conducting a few relevant tests, doctor started some medications. The fever settled down within 24 hrs. 
Amazing doctor and very comforting. Explaination given to the parents is very satisfying. 
I recommend her to all the parents for their children.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Thank  you so much for your kind and thoughtful concern in regard to my child’s health and providing him with excellent medical and physical care. I am most grateful for your kindness whenever I see you. Dr Suruchi Goyal Agarwal is a highly experienced doctor .Being a mother herself she understands our childrens problem very practically ..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: My daughter insisted on me making an appointment to see Dr Suruchi Agarwal since most of her classmates go to her. The comfort and ease with which made the entire appointment a complete breeze. She is extremely gentle with the children, takes her time to understand all the issues related to her ….concentration with her studies to her general fatigue and temperament of the child. She gave us the list of tests that were required and told us to immediately send in the reports for her Perusal. She immediately put her on the required medication and have to admit my daughter is feeling so much better since. Her energy levels have gone up and is in a good frame of mind - it’s good to see her doing better. Thank you Dr for a quick prognosis. I would recommend her to all my friends who have children.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: visited the doctor as my 8 month old kid was on-off fever. Doctor examined him and asked us to do all kind of testing including chest x-ray and covid test. kid cried heavily for each test. CRP was at 10 for which doctor called and asked to admit in ER urgently instead of telling us to monitor him by giving some antibiotics at home.really got scared and consulted few other *********** pediatrician, *** **** ******* ** ***** ** *** ** *** **  ** *** ** ** ****** **** *** **** ************ ** ****** Doctor should understand parents situation ** **** ******* ** ******* **** ** ****** ***** *** ***** ******* *** ***** *** ********* *****

review: Very thorough with explaining what is happening to our infant. Most importantly gives confidence to anxious parents that all problems can be solved

review: Doctor is very friendly and informative. She explained each and every information about the vaccination and also she was very kind enough to my baby. I refer this doctor.
